NHAI/CMD/ Misc_/CIL/2018-Vol.II] Sub: Addendum to SOP/Guidelines on Reimbursement for increaselrecovery for decrease in Royalty rates of minor minerals under Change in Law in EPC/DBFOT projects. (NHAI/Policy Guidelines/EPC & DBFOT Contracts/2019 no_ 2.5.11/2019 dated 17.05.2019) Guidelines on Reimbursement for increase/ recovery for decrease in Royalty rates of minor minerals under Change in Law in EPC/DBFOT projects have been issued vide NHAI/Policy Guidelines/EPC & DBFOT Contracts/2019 no. 2.5.11/2019 dated 17.05.2019_ Para 4 (ii) , (iii) of these   guidelines provides for the  applicability of guidelines in respect of BOT/DBFOT /PPP Toll Projects considering PCOD/COD being achieved after construction for 4-lane works. It is observed that in case of 6-lane Toll projects, COD is given on Appointed Dates and there is provision of PCCICC (Provisional   Completion Certificate/ Completion Certificate): In   straight   reading of these guidelines, the 6-lane projects remain excluded and these guidelines cannot be applied for the Royalty reimbursement case of such 6- lane Toll DBFOT/BOT projects 2 Therefore, in order to include projects of widening from 4-lane to 6-lane on DBFOT/BOT Toll   mode,  following is added under para 4 of the above mentioned guidelines: "4(v) In case of widening from 4-lane to 6-lane projects, the words PCOD/COD in para 4(ii) and 4(iii) above shall be read as PCCICC. 3_ The   Policy Circular dated 17.05.2019 (No. 2.5.11/2019)   stands modified to above extent: 2 Fl (V.K.
